column2: BRIEF-LTC Properties Says Appointed Pamela Shelley-Kessler, Clint Malin To Newly Created Positions Of Co-Presidents May 29 (Reuters) - LTC Properties Inc: * LTC PROPERTIES INC - EFFECTIVE MAY 26, APPOINTED PAMELA SHELLEY-KESSLER AND CLINT MALIN TO NEWLY CREATED POSITIONS OF CO-PRESIDENTS * LTC PROPERTIES INC - SHELLEY-KESSLER WILL RETAIN HER ROLE AS LTC’S CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER * LTC PROPERTIES INC - MALIN WILL CONTINUE AS LTC’S CHIEF INVESTMENT OFFICER * LTC PROPERTIES INC - WENDY SIMPSON WILL REMAIN LTC'S CHAIRMAN AND CEO Source text: (bit.ly/2Moi0mx) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-LTC Sells Portfolio Of Six Assisted Living And Memory Care Communities For $67.5 Mln May 1 (Reuters) - LTC Properties Inc: * PRESS RELEASE - LTC SELLS PORTFOLIO OF SIX ASSISTED LIVING AND MEMORY CARE COMMUNITIES FOR $67.5 MILLION * LTC PROPERTIES INC - AS A RESULT OF TRANSACTION, LTC EXPECTS TO RECOGNIZE A NET GAIN ON SALE OF APPROXIMATELY $48.0 MILLION IN Q2 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
